My Selected Work

Data Management · Data Organization

Excel

Proficient in creating, formatting, and customizing Excel spreadsheets for diverse purposes, including data entry, budgeting, and project management. Expertise in using Excel's extensive library of formulas and functions to perform calculations, manipulate data, and solve complex problems.

View Project

UI/UX Design · Web Design

Figma

Proficient in designing user interfaces (UI) for websites, web applications, and mobile apps using Figma's versatile design tools. Skilled in building interactive prototypes that demonstrate user flows and transitions to visualize the user experience (UX).

View Project

Backend Programming

JavaScript

Skilled in manipulating the Document Object Model (DOM) to dynamically interact with and modify web page content. Proficient in selecting and modifying HTML elements using JavaScript.

View Project

Frontend Programming

Bootstrap

Competent in using Bootstrap's pre-designed layout components such as navigation bars, carousels, modals, and cards to streamline the design and development process. Ability to customize and extend Bootstrap components to match project-specific requirements.

View Project
